<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hilt Hammer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3591) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097)

</column>

---

You know how to turn any weapon into a bone-crushing implement of skeletal destruction. Melee weapons you wield gain the [versatile B](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait. You can use the weapon only to deal bludgeoning damage when making melee attacks. At the GM's discretion, specific weapons might not be able to gain the versatile B trait.
name: Hilt Hammer
